title: i hve broblem with LP
body:
I have problem with LP.
I was have 6000 LP but my 3000P was gone.
I don't know why.
I dint but northing  because I try to buy jhin.
Pliz help me riot.

I wana play Jhin  I play more then 24hour for make  LP pliz help riot......

replies.body:
Hey there,

As this is an account specific enquiry, we here on the boards are unable to assist you.

You'll need to [submit a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) for further assistance regarding this matter.
